text: ma daivalalo nundi kondaru niku kidu kaligincaru (ninnu picciki guri cesaru) ani matrame memu anagalamu!" Atanu (hud) javabiccadu: "Ayana (allah) tappa! Miru ayanaku sati kalpince vatito niscayanga, naku elanti sambandham ledani, nenu allah nu saksiga pedutunnanu mariyu miru kuda saksuluga undandi
